item.title: LED Coffee Table
item.author: jasmeet0915@gmail.com (Jasmeet Singh)
item.description: Made in collaboration with the Hatchnhack Makerspace in Delhi, we made a complete coffe table with a 12x12 LED Matrix inside for playing interactiveness and cool animations. The project used WS2812B LEDs with an ESP32 Dev Board at the heart for the controls
